panels.title: Risk Factors
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"distribution","type":"pie","maxNumOfSlices":30},"series":{"Asset Not Encrypted":{"visible":true},"Not Protected by Network IDS":{"visible":true},"Disabled User Found":{"visible":true},"Not Protected by Host IDS":{"visible":true},"Critical Severity Vulnerabilities Detected":{"visible":true},"Potential Public-facing Asset":{"visible":true},"Potential Unmanaged Asset":{"visible":true},"Open to Public Inbound Access":{"visible":true},"Endpoint Infections/Threats Detected":{"visible":true},"Others":{"visible":true}}}

queries.queryString: ($$logsrc )| parse regex field=Risk_Factors"(?:\[\"|,\"|^\")(?<riskfactor>[^\"]+)" multi | count_distinct(asset) group by riskfactor

panels.title: Top 10 Services
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"distribution","type":"pie","maxNumOfSlices":10},"series":{"Asset Not Encrypted":{"visible":true},"Not Protected by Network IDS":{"visible":true},"Disabled User Found":{"visible":true},"Not Protected by Host IDS":{"visible":true},"Critical Severity Vulnerabilities Detected":{"visible":true},"Potential Public-facing Asset":{"visible":true},"Potential Unmanaged Asset":{"visible":true},"Open to Public Inbound Access":{"visible":true},"Endpoint Infections/Threats Detected":{"visible":true},"Others":{"visible":true},"ftp":{"visible":true},"ldap":{"visible":true},"https":{"visible":true},"http":{"visible":true},"irdmi":{"visible":true},"sqlexec":{"visible":true},"pop3s":{"visible":true},"wap-wsp":{"visible":true},"emcrmird":{"visible":true},"http-alt":{"visible":true},"ms-wbt-server":{"visible":true},"mongodb":{"visible":true},"syslog-conn":{"visible":true},"fcp-addr-srvr1":{"visible":true},"italk":{"visible":true},"rfb":{"visible":true},"ideafarm-door":{"visible":true},"redis":{"visible":true},"ddi-udp-1":{"visible":true},"syslog":{"visible":true},"lxi-evntsvc":{"visible":true},"glrpc":{"visible":true},"domain":{"visible":true},"ssh":{"visible":true},"mysql":{"visible":true},"remoteware-cl":{"visible":true},"cslistener":{"visible":true}}}

queries.queryString: ($$logsrc )| parse regex field=Services"(?:\[\"|,\"|^\")(?<service>[^\"]+)" multi | count_distinct(asset) group by service
